{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.659
    | text      = So this was a pretty big deal in the 2008 primary season in January when Hillary Clinton
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:28.340
    | text      = didn't cry, but welled up a tiny bit when answering questions at an undecided voters
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.019
    | text      = meeting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:35.019
    | text      = She was asked how she keeps going on the campaign trail and she said it was hard, but she loved
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.580
    | text      = the country and while answering, she looked like she was expressing some real emotion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:43.220
    | text      = This was notable because the press liked to characterize Hillary as a heartless robot
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.740
    | text      = type in no small part thanks to the inherent misogyny that ran under media coverage back
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:51.179
    | text      = then and to a lesser extent still.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.659
    | text      = If Hillary showed normal human emotion, she would be branded as too emotional to lead
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.700
    | text      = on account of her irrational femininity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:59.740
    | text      = Conversely, if she showed no emotion, she was a calculating power hungry machine with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.460
    | text      = ice water in her veins.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.580
    | text      = Maybe the media had a negative way to frame her actions no matter how she acted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:10.860
    | text      = After this incident in 2008, Hillary pulled out an unexpected win in the New Hampshire
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.419
    | text      = primary largely due to a surge in women voters turning out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.980
    | text      = The polling about this primary was all over the place and part of the reason was the chaotic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:23.179
    | text      = beginning to both the campaigns for Obama and for Hillary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.940
    | text      = Hillary was the presumptive favorite before the primary started and was polling way ahead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.539
    | text      = Then Obama won the Iowa caucuses and Hillary came in third behind Obama and John Edward.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.100
    | text      = Obama carried that momentum and Hillary's campaign took a huge hit in people's estimation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.059
    | text      = Polling numbers went way down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.100
    | text      = This is part of what's in the background of that question she was asked at the voter meeting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:49.299
    | text      = about how she keeps going.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:51.259
    | text      = It obviously wasn't all about her emotional moment but she overperformed in New Hampshire
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.820
    | text      = and the media talked about it a lot and this is part of the story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.779
    | text      = Anyway, the media has now made it a story that Hillary was showing emotion and people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
